duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain .NET applications using C#, ASP.NET (MVC), Entity Framework, and other relevant technologies.
Collaborate with the development team to build scalable and high-performing systems.
Design and implement web services, console applications, and scripts to support application functionality.
Utilize SQL Server for database development, including stored procedures, functions, triggers, and performance tuning.
Demonstrate strong analytical skills to troubleshoot and resolve defects reported by clients and production support tickets.
Perform root cause analysis and identify the defect area, while also understanding complex business processes and workflow.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
